name: MATESON CHEMICAL CORPORATION, Respondent v. Stephanie Mateson BARTON, Petitioner

parties: MATESON CHEMICAL CORPORATION, Respondent v. Stephanie Mateson BARTON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of October, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
958 A.2d 494
MATESON CHEMICAL CORPORATION, Respondent v. Stephanie Mateson BARTON, Petitioner.
No. 108 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 2, 2008.
